# haproxy_userlist (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "haproxy_userlist" "user1" {
  name = haproxy_userlist.userslist.name
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the Userlist. It must be unique

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
